sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p:
Medical writing was provided by Drs. Jonathan
10.13039/100007921 Pitt
and Julie Harriague (4Clinics, Paris, France) and paid for by
10.13039/100014588 Sanofi Pasteur
. The authors would like to thank Jason Lee (Sanofi Pasteur, Toronto, Canada) for developing Fig. 1. HY acknowledges financial support from the National Science Fund for Distinguished Young Scholars (No. 81525023) and National Science and Technology Major Project of China (No. 2017ZX10103009-005, 2018ZX10713001-007).

sec.title: Funding
sec.p:
This work was funded by
10.13039/100014588 Sanofi Pasteur
